title: Match Summary A
text: Kohli guided the chase with calculated singles in the middle overs; left-arm pace was less effective at Eden Gardens.

title: Bowling Analysis
text: Wrist spin in the death overs contained run rate; yorkers forced mishits at Wankhede.

title: Powerplay Review
text: Aggressive powerplay with high strike rate against off-spin; fielding lapses added 10 extra runs.
